roleset.name: Be in motion

roles.note: Like other motion verbs, when an animate entity is mobilizing itself, the subject is arg0. See example.

roleset.note: Roleset based on Thyme instances. Framed by Claire, comparison to mobilize.01

example.name: Mover, moved in one animate entity = Arg0
example.text: Husband advised that someone should be close contact whenever pt. is mobilizing .
